### Step zero
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(modeldata)
View(attrition)
```

## Problem 1

```{r}
ggplot(
  attrition,
  aes(
    x = MonthlyIncome,
    y = Education,
    fill = Education
  )
) +
  geom_boxplot(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(
    x = "Monthly income",
    title = "Learn to Earn"
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#1c9e78", "#d95f01", "#7570b3", "#e7298a", "#67a61f"))
```

## Problem 2

```{r}
ggplot(
  attrition,
  aes(
    x = Age
  )
) +
  geom_histogram(show.legend = FALSE, 
                 binwidth = 4.7, 
                 color = '#036703', 
                 fill = '#90ee8f'
  )
```

## Problem 3

```{r}
ggplot(
  attrition,
  aes(
    x = JobSatisfaction,
    fill = Attrition
  )
) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  labs(
    x = "Job Satisfaction",
    y = "Count",
    title = "Corrolation of Satisfaction and Attrition",
    caption = "from attrition db",
    fill = "Attrition Status"
  ) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = 'Dark2')
```
